name: Clad in Plaid
description:
Premise:

Brad the chad is clad in plaid. He has managed to end up on top of a building in an apocalyptic scenario, his objective? Stay on that dang building no matter the cost...

This game was made in 40 hours, excluding sleep and other applications of life for the ludum dare 49. Theme being: "Unstable". I restarted my game after 2 hours, as my idea was falling apart the further I coded.

All This Information Is In-Game (with an expertly executed voice over, might I add) Powerups Troublesome Little Dinguses
